column1: Smoque BBQ////Man-oh-man the stuff over here is amazing it's like a well-oiled machine wherever the manager is there the better give him the God damn pay raise because he's got that thing working like clockwork and I've been supporting them for the last seven and a half years since they've opened since day one so make sure you guys stay there and keep the portions as big as they are because guess what I'm a hungry little Polak and I'm cheap nothing seriously it's not about the cheese I was just trying to be a smart-ass the great job great food and great customer service and please over Gozer tip the goddamn staff they're not your slaves or indentured servants they work especially for the ones that work the bussing area they do such a great job compliment them guys
